quotes.quote: A man who desires revenge should dig two graves.
Can't get blood from a stone.
Dead men don't bite.
Dead men tell no tales.
Death is the great leveller.
Give the devil his due.
He who plots to hurt others often hurts himself.
Neglect kills injuries, revenge increases them.
The old law about an eye for an eye leaves everybody blind.
Revenge is a kind of wild justice, which the more a man's nature runs to, the more ought law to weed it out.
Revenge proves its own executioner.
The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
Revenge is simply justice with teeth.
For revenge is always the delight of a mean spirit, of a weak and petty mind! You may immediately draw proof of this-that no one rejoices more in revenge than a woman.
The best revenge is to improve yourself.
Revenge is sweet but not nourishing.
The best revenge is to live well.
The best revenge is massive success.
Revenge is a dish best served cold.
Revenge is an inhuman word.
Revenge, one for the lost and the lonely.
I breathe revenge tonight, it never tasted to sweet
Revenge has always been looked upon as a sin and sometimes you feel like you had to sin to win.
Oh, my revenge is bitter sweet.
Like revenge is sweet on corrupted meat, the compulsion to feed the flames of greed.
And my act of revenge is just a part of the struggle.
Revenge must be the reason, why forgiveness was a thing I never knew.
Revenge is the method, whenever stepping keep a weapon close.
Stop this madness before it starts, revenge will only cause you regret.
And we both take our revenge but we still don't feel any better.
